result.purpose: This folder/module is responsible for managing task scheduling through a scheduler handler using the asynq library.
result.architecture: The folder follows a modular architecture pattern, encapsulating the scheduling logic and its related handlers, promoting separation of concerns and reusability.

internal/domains/scheduler/handlers/sche.purpose: This file defines a scheduler handler for managing task scheduling using the asynq library.
side_effects: Enqueues tasks to the asynq client
risks: Potential for unhandled errors during task enqueueing
Possible denial of service if too many tasks are enqueued
